div.p: Formerly known as the MEI Advisory Board for the purposes of the NEH/DFG grant, the MEI Council will establish the goals and govern the operation of the MEI organisation.
The current membership of the MEI Council is:

ul.li: Bernhard R. Appel (Beethoven-Archiv und Verlag, Beethoven-Haus Bonn)
Gabriele Buschmeier (Akademie der Wissenschaften und der Literatur, Mainz)
J. Stephen Downie (Graduate School of Library and Information Science, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign)
Erin Mayhood (Music Library, University of Virginia)
Stefan Morent (Department of Musicology, University of Tübingen)
Daniel Pitti (Institute for Advanced Technology in the Humanities, University of Virginia)
Perry Roland (Alderman Library, University of Virginia)
Craig Sapp (Center for Computer-Assisted Research in the Humanities, Stanford University)
Eleanor Selfridge-Field (Center for Computer-Assisted Research in the Humanities, Stanford University)
Joachim Veit, (Carl-Maria-von-Weber-Gesamtausgabe, Musikwissenschaftliches Seminar Detmold / Paderborn)
